General.Name: Portage Fintech Acquisition Corp Unit
General.Description: Portage Fintech Acquisition Corporation intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities in the financial technology or financial services ecosystem. Portage Fintech Acquisition Corporation was incorporated in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.
General.Address: 280 Park Avenue, New York, NY, United States, 10017
